http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: The evidence of the verifiable credential. It contains information about the process which resulted in the issuance of the verifiable credential.

http://purl.org/dc/terms/description.@value: EDC constraints for the controlled vocabularies used by EDC application profile, provides the constraints on controlled vocabularies used.

http://purl.org/dc/terms/title.@value: SHACL constraints for the controlled vocabularies used by European Digital Credentials application profile

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: This document specifies the set SHACL constraints on classes and properties used in the EDC application profile, with respect to the controlled vocabularies used.

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#lab.@value: Controlled Vocabularies SHACL constraints for EDC Application Profile
